question: Who bagged the title of Peter England Mr India 2017 recently?
explanation: Jitesh Singh Deo bagged the title of Peter England Mr India 2017. The first runner up was Abhi Khajuria and the second runner up was Pavan Rao. The winners were felicitated by actor Kangana Ranaut. Jitesh will represent India at the Mister World 2020 contest in 2020 and Prathamesh Maulingkar of Goa titled Mr India Supranational 2017 and will represent the nation at Mr Supranational 2018
